properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 12 at 2:12PM CST until February 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind
chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter
Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45
mph.

* WHERE...Hyde and Buffalo Counties.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST Thursday.
For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or
evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING
